summary.description:
Image processing in Python.

Image processing routines for SciPy.

Note: this repo is not actively maintained, and may be out of date.

Image processing in Python — scikit-image.

The scikit-image Open Source Project on Open Hub.

scikit-image 0.17.dev0 docs — skimage v0.17.dev0 docs.

Please refer to the online documentation at https://scikit-image.org/.

scikit-image is a collection of algorithms for image processing. It is available free of charge and free of restriction. We pride ourselves on high-quality, peer-reviewed code, written by an active community of volunteers.

Image processing algorithms for SciPy, including IO, morphology, filtering, warping, color manipulation, object detection, etc.

scikit-image is an image processing toolbox for SciPy.

Analyzed 3 days ago. based on code collected 3 days ago.

summary.name: scikit-image
